Title: Title
Include Storage Path data setup in Optio: Include Storage Path data setup in Options/Storage
Include Site Enabled settings from Optio: Include Site Enabled settings from Option/Scrappers
Selected Sites includes scenes for sites: Selected Sites includes scenes for sites enabled in Options/Scrapers. All sites does not filter based on sites.
Only includes scenes matching the Saved: Only includes scenes matching the Saved Search criteria. Applys to the Export function, not the Import
Include the main scene data, eg title, s: Include the main scene data, eg title, site, cast, tags, filenames, images, favorites, star ratings, etc
Include Cuepoint data you have entered f: Include Cuepoint data you have entered for a scene
Include your history of watching scenes: Include your history of watching scenes
Include scene edit data. Edits allows XB: Include scene edit data. Edits allows XBVR to reapply your changes to scene data. These would be lost if a scene is rescraped
Include details of files matched to a sc: Include details of files matched to a scene
Select a file to upload and import: Select a file to upload and import
New/Overwrite will overwite existing dat: New/Overwrite will overwite existing data as well as add new records, New will only add new records, existing data is not changed
Generating the data for a large number o: Generating the data for a large number of scenes is time consuming, montior progress in the status messages in the top right of the browser
You should exclude Studios from your Cus: You should exclude Studios from your Custom list (scrapers.json) if sharing data with others
If blank a Scene Id will be generated bu: If blank a Scene Id will be generated but cannot be changed later
Optional: select one or more words to ta: Optional: select one or more words to target searching to a specific field
Defaults date range to the last week. No: Defaults date range to the last week. Note:must match yyyy-mm-dd, include leading zeros
